charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F  BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE.  On or about 12/19/16, in Iroquois County, defendant did take by force US currency in the custody of Federated Bank of Chebanse, whose deposits were FDIC insured in violation of 18 USC 2113(a).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: It is the judgment of the Court that the defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 72 months. Said term shall consist of 72 months on each of Counts 1-3, to be served concurrently. Following release from custody, defendant shall serve a 3 (three) year term of supervised release, with conditions. Said term shall consist of 3 (three) years on each of Counts 1-3, to be served concurrently. Defendant shall pay restitution in the amount of 38,728 and a special assessment of $300.

charges.charge_disposition: It is the judgment of the Court that the defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 72 months. Following release from custody, defendant shall serve a 3 (three) year term of supervised release, with conditions. Said term shall consist of 3 (three) years on each of Counts 1-3, to be served concurrently. Defendant shall pay restitution in the amount of 38,728 and a special assessment of $300.

charges.charge_disposition: It is the judgment of the Court that the defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 72 months. Said term shall consist of 72 months on each of Counts 1-3, to be served concurrently. Following release from custody, defendant shall serve a 3 (three) year term of supervised release, with conditions. Said term shall consist of 3 (three) years on each of Counts 1-3, to be served concurrently. Defendant shall pay restitution in the amount of 38,728 and a special assessment of $300.
